main.name: Akash Garg
main.description: Here will be your description. Use this to describe what you do or whatever you feel best describes yourself to a potential employer
main.bio: I am currently a pre-final year student at The BML Munjal University and pursuing my B.Tech from here. I am a self taught Full Stack Web Developer and have a year of experience in Data Science and Machine Learning. I have also got 1st place in hackathon by Alibaba Cloud and Tianchi Labs. I believe that to be successful in life, one needs to be obsessive with their dreams and keep working towards them.
main.contactmessage: Have a project for me? Think I'd be a good fit for your team? I'd love to hear from you, give me a shout by email or by using the form below if you'd like to get in contact with me.

education.degree: bachelor of technology in computer science and engineering

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
